title: Waco: The Big Lie Continues (Part 2) - Linda Thompson
description:
Part 2 of Linda Thompson's Waco: The Big Lie

This is a much longer video and talks about a lot of things. Unique to this video, it shows how the Jewish Anti-Defamation League uses a front called the Cult Awareness Network (CAN) to wage terrorism on Christians and other religious groups. This video shows how CAN basically inititated the siege of the Branch Davidian Church by making false accusations against Koresh and its members. It shows how Bill Clinton made an emotional speech at the US Memorial Holocaust Museum the same day that the Branch Davidians were being murdered by fire and gun shots.

A must see.
